Welcome!

I'm a master's student in Physics at Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE), Brazil, under the advisement of prof. Anderson Monteiro Amaral and prof. Leonardo de Souza Menezes. My research focuses on the usage of lanthanide-doped dielectric nanoparticles as temperature sensors through spectroscopic analysis. I have a broad interest in Scientific Instrumentation, Software Design, and Electronics.
